name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
— Using the correct and complete set of drawings
— All drawings are the latest revision
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PMP, EMP, ECP, TMP, SWMS.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PMP, EMP, ECP, TMP, SWMS
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Dilapidation report has been completed prior to establishment of site.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
1.4 - Installation of sediment and environmental controls
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Adequate sediment and environmental controls have been implemented as per the site EMP & ECP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All services are located and the relevant service authorities have been consulted and permits obtained
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Setout of excavation and works to be done by DTP Geotechnical Engineer
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any saw cutting commencing.
○ Extent and location of cuts to be clearly set out and checked prior to saw cutting
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any excavation commencing.
○ Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation and always remain within the parameters of the Native Vegetation permit.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Exc Permit Native Veg Permit Design Dwg
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
2.3 - Inspection of the Base of the Fill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Floor of layers to be free draining towards face (0.5%) or sub-soil drain installed taken to ends of site outletting below toe of works.
○ The Superintendent and Works Supervisor shall inspect sub-grade material prior to placement of rock in accordance with clause 204.04
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Benches to be cut at widths of 0.7m. Maximum overall excavation angle must not exceed 60 degrees (0.6h:1v).
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Surplus material, debris and demolished material are to be sorted and transported off site. Material to be kept in condition for re-use where possible.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Machinery must be approved weights and only used in staging as detailed for the impact & load assessment. Un-approved machinery cannot be used.
○ Ensure extents of rock fill is wrapped in approved Geotextile layer.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Base of excavation prepared and test rolled in accordance with Section 173 & 204 prior to placement of geotextile and geogrid.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
2.8 - Placement of 40mm Class 3 Crushed Rock Layers and Geogrid

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Density testing each layer as per section 304 at compaction standard C (not less than 98%). Density Test Results for first to layers to be provided to DTP Prior to placement of remaining layors.

○ Placement of approved non-woven geogrid shall be roller out perpendicular to the centreline with no joints parallel to the centreline. The Geogrid shall wrap around each layer as per drawing (refer section 210 and placed at the base of excavation in conjunction with Geotextile fabric.
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD: Density Testing/ Visual Inspection
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed & Test Reports
RESPONSIBILITY: Site Engineer/ Site Foreman/DPT Geo-Technical Engineer
2.9 - Placement of Subase layer 20mm Class 3 Crushed Rock Placed in two equal layers
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Density testing each layer as per section 304 at compaction standard C (not less than 98%)
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed & Test Reports
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Place local topsoil 50mm minimum thickness along the batter of the works and place jute matting over extent of works ensuring jute mat is pinned in place.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As Per Kerb & Channel ITP_002
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed & Kerb & Channel ITP
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As Per Guardrail ITP_003
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed & Guardrail ITP
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As Per Asphalt ITP_004
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed & Asphalt ITP
